about_the_game:
Due to poor sales of the game, and finally due to financial problems, the studio disbanded, played, it will be a refund, the back may not have updated, thank you for several months of support! ! !

This is a world abandoned by the gods! In the polluted wasteland, there is only one technological city controlled by the super company. In the city, the company's high-level people are drunk, the bottom employees are exploited. Outside the high walls surrounding the city, the exiled jobless wanderers struggle to survive in the fierce environment and the mouth of wild animals, such as hell. Now, a teenager comes to M78 community



As a responsible (no jiecao) game studio, we will keep the frequency of at least once every two weeks to update the game (as long as you leave a message for us to change, we will).

In recent updates, we modified some minor bugs, optimized some art resources, and improved the three story lines of the game.

In the future, we will continue to update, including but not limited to the following: adding new plots, improving equipment system, optimizing character career and attribute performance.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us directly, and we will reply and modify in the first time.

Thank you for your support.



"The blue planet - the lost city of cyberspace" is a simulation business game with a plot. It is an improvement attempt of our traditional city simulation game. Let you experience the fun of solving puzzles and role-playing games while operating urban communities.

In our game, you will take a community in the cyberpunk city as the base, together with many game characters, explore the ancient civilization relics in the wasteland outside the city, and resolve the crisis of the destruction of urban civilization. Finally, it will solve the Ultimate Puzzle of the birth of the city.



The direction of the plot is up to you:

This is a simulation game with plot! Choice, destiny! And fate, by your own control! Every time you choose, it will affect the future of the plot! Different plot branches, you will have different buildings and partners, the final outcome will be different! Remember! Choose carefully!



Mysterious wilderness:

In order to access the resources of the development community, you must enter the dangerous wasteland for exploration and collection! The battle with the savage creatures in the wasteland cannot be avoided! But don't worry, your employees have unique combat skills. The higher the level, the more ferocious the combat effectiveness! Absolutely can help you!



Rich and changeable task chain:

As a high-ranking community director, it's hard to avoid human contact. Your employees and the company, the wilderness hunters of all camps, will have to ask for you! Try to help them! To complete the task they released, the reward is very rich!



Your team:

Every time you operate, it will affect your reputation in the city and attract all kinds of talents to join your community. Don't be so stingy with your employees! Upgrade their equipment, give props to strengthen their strength, let them enter your community, will let you in the wilderness adventure without going to the disadvantage!



Various task items and props:

In addition to your harvest of exploring the wasteland, don't forget that the company has also rationed supermarkets for you! As your community upgrades step by step, there will be more items and props available in the store! But remember, many props are limited in time and quantity! Never forget to buy!



Community rating:

Every month and every year, your community will get the rating of the company's headquarters! The higher your score, the more rewarding your company will be. Work hard for the five-star community rating! It won't embarrass you, will it?



Cyberpunk architecture:

The gray air is full of haze, only the dazzling neon lights are shining! You can build three different styles of buildings in the specified area of the community to build your unique style of community.



The ultimate secret of being rich:

Perhaps, you have found that different buildings together will have a special effect! Try to match different buildings and discover the secrets of the area. It not only has a special bonus, but also can make your community score soar! Remember! This is your ultimate secret!



Buildings can also be upgraded:

Is there no one in the supermarket? It doesn't matter. Let's have a promotion! More activities can attract more popularity. When the number of visitors meets the requirements, the building can be upgraded! After upgrading, not only the appearance of the building will become more gorgeous, but also you will earn more!



Come and hold the event:

Your team is getting bigger and bigger, and the fixed-point training of employees is starting to be a bit troublesome? It doesn't matter. As long as you spend your crystal, you can hold a series of activities every month to improve the whole team! Speech competition or fighting competition, so that you can spare no effort to improve the team's strength!
